Title: Aiding the Accord: Time Rift
Description:
The Bronze Dragonflight have long labored in secret, dealing with temporal anomalies nearly as quickly as they're able to manifest. It would appear, however, that the anomalies have gotten a bit too big as of late.

That's where you come in.

You can find Soridormi leading an effort against a particularly nasty set of Time Rifts just to the east of Valdrakken. Aid her in whatever way she deems necessary.
ObjectivesText: Travel to the Tyrhold Reservoir and assist Soridormi in dispelling a Time Rift. Continue your efforts in aiding the Valdrakken Accord and their allies throughout the Dragon Isles.
